title: Spacetime Score Registry
subtitle: We propose to create a token to track score
desc: We want to reward the winners of events with a score and think the best way to make these score points relevant is by making them as Cardano tokens.
The score will then be exchangeable and compatible with Cardano smart contracts like decentralized exchanges but is not meant to be speculated on and the team will not provide liquidity.
The main utility of this score token is to keep track of who are the most active and best players in the spacetime community and display them on top of leaderboards.
